Name: VR Eagles of Victorian England
About the game: This is a VR tour game that focuses on leisure and relaxation. Players tour the UK from the perspective of a griffon. They mainly choose the following classic scenes, including the 18th century library, the 18th century conference room, the 18th century interior design, and the 18th century Victoria Street. 20th century sunset streets and 21st century concept houses, allowing gamers to experience the charming British style in depth, and enjoy the exotic scenery without leaving home. It is suitable for relaxing and adding fun after busy work and life. movement: The left handle touchpad controls the movement back and forth, left and right, and the grip button switches the viewing angle; The right handle touchpad controls up and down movement and left and right rotation, and the grip button adjusts the browsing speed; menu: The trigger button on the left handle can interact with the menu button; In the scene browsing, press the menu button to call up the menu bar.
